name: YASHWANT MEMORIAL TRUST

address: ASHOKA GARDENS, B-14, NEAR OLD POST OFFICE

briefDescription: The Trust has been been imparting education to the poor and masses in Panvel, district Raigad, state Maharashtra, India for more than 15 years.  Since the inception, the Trust has been functioning from the personal property of the Trustees at free of cost. At present, the Trust runs Junior College of Vocational Education, Institute of Vocational Education, Study Centre of Yashwantrao Chavan Maharashtra Open University, Nashik. The Trust arranges free guidance camps for students of secondary and higher secondary education, employment and self employment guidance centre to the youths to direct them in finding right career in their life. The Trust is keenly interested in providing skill based, employment and self-employment oriented education.
